Message:
“Homunculi who have become
witches usually live
for about a year.
Maybe three years at most.”

“That’s why I want you to
live out the rest of your time
like a normal girl, Little A.”

The underdeveloped
human children were constantly
engrossed in their inane babble
or petty quarrels, sometimes
erupting in shrill laughter.

It all seemed like nothing more
than a baffling experiment to me.

Whenever I caught a glimpse
of my sister in the halls,
she was always by Mother’s side.

Seeing that each time made
my heart ache harder and harder...

Mother had told us
to live like normal girls.

Nothing about my memories,
my heart, or even
my sense of time is normal.

As long as I could stay
with my big sister,
I was content...
